aircraft.value: Medusa Strike - AC-4758-206 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 15/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 17/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 20/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 20/06/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 25/06/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
